default.title: Mercury Retrograde {year}
default.description: Navigate the Mercury Retrograde periods of {year} with confidence. Learn the dates, what to expect, and practical tips for communication, technology, and travel.

whatIs.question: When is Mercury Retrograde in {year}?
whatIs.answer: Mercury goes retrograde 3-4 times each year for about 3 weeks per period. During these times, Mercury appears to move backward in the sky, affecting communication, technology, and travel.

default.intro: Mercury retrograde is a cycle of review. It slows the pace so you can revise plans, reconnect with people, and check the details you usually miss.
default.tldr: Mercury Retrograde {year} brings several periods of review and reflection. Focus on revisiting old projects, double-checking communications, and planning extra time for travel. Avoid signing major contracts and making big purchases when possible.
default.meaning:
Mercury Retrograde {year} invites you to slow down and review. While often feared, these periods offer valuable opportunities for reflection, revision, and reconnection.

During Mercury retrograde, you may experience:
- Communication misunderstandings and delays
- Technology glitches and malfunctions
- Travel disruptions and scheduling changes
- Past situations or people resurfacing

The key is to embrace the re- energy: review, revise, reflect, reconnect, and reconsider. Use these periods wisely rather than fighting against them.
howToWorkWith: Back up important files and devices before each retrograde begins
Allow extra time for travel and important meetings
Double-check all communications before sending
Review contracts carefully but delay signing if possible
Reconnect with old friends, colleagues, or creative projects
Use the time for editing, revising, and completing unfinished work
emotionalThemes: Nostalgia and reflection on the past
Reconnection with people from your history

faqs.question: Should I avoid traveling during Mercury retrograde?
faqs.answer: Travel is still possible, but expect delays or scheduling changes. Build in extra time, double-check reservations, and have backup plans.

faqs.question: Can I sign contracts during Mercury retrograde?
faqs.answer: It is best to avoid signing important contracts due to potential misunderstandings or overlooked details. If you must sign, read everything carefully and consider a second review.

faqs.question: How long do Mercury retrograde effects last?
faqs.answer: Effects often begin 1-2 weeks before the official retrograde (pre-shadow) and continue 1-2 weeks after it ends (post-shadow).

default.ctaText: Get your personalized Mercury retrograde forecast

2026.title: Mercury Retrograde 2026
2026.description: Complete Mercury Retrograde 2026 guide with exact dates, what to expect, and how to navigate communication and technology challenges. Includes survival tips.

whatIs.question: When is Mercury Retrograde in 2026?
whatIs.answer: Mercury goes retrograde 3-4 times each year for about 3 weeks per period. In 2026, Mercury retrograde occurs in late winter, late spring/early summer, and fall.

2026.tldr: Mercury Retrograde 2026 brings 3-4 periods of review and reflection. Focus on revisiting old projects, reconnecting with people from your past, and double-checking all communications.
2026.meaning:
Mercury Retrograde 2026 invites you to slow down and review various areas of your life. While often feared, these periods offer valuable opportunities for reflection, revision, and reconnection.

During Mercury retrograde, you may experience:
- Communication misunderstandings and delays
- Technology glitches and malfunctions
- Travel disruptions and scheduling changes
- Past situations or people resurfacing

The key is to embrace the re- energy: review, revise, reflect, reconnect, and reconsider. Use these periods wisely rather than fighting against them.
howToWorkWith: Back up all digital files and devices before retrograde begins
Allow extra time for travel and important meetings
Double-check all communications before sending
Review contracts carefully but delay signing if possible
Reconnect with old friends, colleagues, or creative projects
Practice patience with technology and communication issues
Use the time for editing, revising, and completing unfinished work
emotionalThemes: Nostalgia and reflection on the past
Reconnection with people from your history
Liberation through letting go of outdated patterns

faqs.question: Should I avoid traveling during Mercury Retrograde 2026?
faqs.answer: Travel is still possible, but expect delays, lost luggage, or booking errors. Build in extra time, double-check reservations, and have backup plans.

faqs.question: Can I sign contracts during Mercury Retrograde?
faqs.answer: It is generally advised to avoid signing important contracts due to potential misunderstandings or overlooked details. If you must sign, read everything carefully and consider a third party review.

faqs.question: How long before Mercury goes direct do effects last?
faqs.answer: Mercury retrograde effects typically begin 1-2 weeks before the official retrograde (pre-shadow) and continue for 1-2 weeks after it ends (post-shadow).

2026.ctaText: Get your personalized Mercury Retrograde forecast

default.title: Venus Retrograde {year}
default.h1: Venus Retrograde {year}: Love, Values, and Reflection
default.description: Explore Venus Retrograde {year} dates, meanings, and how to work with love, relationships, and finances during this reflective cycle.

whatIs.question: When is Venus Retrograde in {year}?
whatIs.answer: Venus retrograde happens about every 18 months and lasts roughly 6 weeks. It is a time to reassess relationships, values, and financial priorities.

default.intro: Venus retrograde shifts the focus inward. It highlights relationship patterns, value alignment, and what you truly want to invest in.
default.tldr: Venus Retrograde {year} emphasizes review of relationships, values, and finances. It is better for reflection and repair than for starting new commitments.
default.meaning:
Venus Retrograde {year} is a period for re-evaluating love, values, and money. Old relationships may resurface, priorities shift, and you may see what you truly value with more clarity.

Use this time to review:
- Relationship patterns and boundaries
- Spending habits and financial priorities
- Creative goals and aesthetic direction
- What feels nourishing and aligned
howToWorkWith: Reflect on relationship dynamics and unmet needs
Reassess your values and spending habits
Reconnect with creative projects you paused
Practice patience with romantic decisions
Focus on self-worth and inner alignment
emotionalThemes: A desire to slow down in love

faqs.question: Should I start a new relationship during Venus retrograde?
faqs.answer: It is generally better to avoid major new commitments during Venus retrograde. Use the time to reflect and revisit what you truly want.

faqs.question: Does Venus retrograde affect finances?
faqs.answer: Yes. It is a good time to review spending habits and avoid large purchases that may not feel aligned later.

default.ctaText: Get your personalized Venus retrograde forecast

default.title: {year} Eclipses
default.description: Complete guide to {year} eclipses including solar and lunar eclipse dates, meanings, and rituals. Learn how eclipse season affects your life.

whatIs.question: What are the {year} eclipse dates?
whatIs.answer: {year} features multiple eclipses across two eclipse seasons. Eclipses are powerful turning points that accelerate change and bring fated events into our lives.

default.intro: Eclipses bring accelerated change. They highlight what needs to be released or begun and often reveal the next step in your path.
default.tldr: The {year} eclipses bring major life shifts and turning points. Eclipse energy is potent, so prioritize rest and reflection. Lunar eclipses release, solar eclipses begin.
default.meaning:
Eclipses in {year} mark pivotal moments of change and transformation. Unlike regular full and new moons, eclipses bring sudden shifts, revelations, and fated events that align you with the path ahead.

Solar eclipses (new moons amplified):
- Powerful new beginnings and fresh starts
- Unexpected opportunities emerging
- Doors opening that were previously closed

Lunar eclipses (full moons amplified):
- Culminations and endings
- Emotional revelations and breakthroughs
- Releasing what no longer serves you
howToWorkWith: Avoid major manifestation rituals during the eclipse itself
Surrender to the changes unfolding rather than forcing outcomes
Journal about what needs to be released (lunar) or begun (solar)
Rest and reflect during eclipse energy
Pay attention to themes that emerge within 2 weeks of each eclipse
emotionalThemes: Fatigue and need for extra rest

faqs.question: Can I manifest during an eclipse?
faqs.answer: Traditional wisdom advises against active manifestation during eclipses, as the energy is volatile. Observe what emerges and set intentions after the eclipse energy stabilizes.

faqs.question: How long do eclipse effects last?
faqs.answer: Eclipse effects can unfold for up to 6 months. Shifts often begin within 2 weeks of the eclipse, but the full story can take longer to reveal.

faqs.question: Why do I feel tired during eclipses?
faqs.answer: Eclipses involve powerful energy shifts that can be physically and emotionally draining. Rest and avoid over-scheduling during eclipse windows.

default.ctaText: See how {year} eclipses affect your birth chart

2026.title: 2026 Eclipses
2026.description: Complete guide to 2026 eclipses including solar and lunar eclipse dates, astrological meanings, and rituals. Learn how eclipse season affects your life.

whatIs.question: What are the 2026 eclipse dates?
whatIs.answer: 2026 features four eclipses across two eclipse seasons. The first eclipse season occurs in late winter/early spring, and the second in late summer/fall.

2026.tldr: The 2026 eclipses bring major life shifts and turning points. Eclipse energy is potent. Avoid major manifestation rituals during eclipses and instead surrender to the changes unfolding.
2026.meaning:
Eclipses in 2026 mark pivotal moments of change and transformation. Unlike regular full and new moons, eclipses operate on a different level. They bring sudden shifts, revelations, and fated events that align us with our path.

Solar eclipses (new moons amplified):
- Powerful new beginnings and fresh starts
- Unexpected opportunities emerging
- Doors opening that were previously closed
- Setting intentions that manifest over 6 months

Lunar eclipses (full moons amplified):
- Culminations and endings
- Emotional revelations and breakthroughs
- Releasing what no longer serves you
- Truth coming to light
howToWorkWith: Avoid performing major manifestation rituals during the eclipse itself
Surrender to the changes unfolding rather than forcing outcomes
Journal about what needs to be released (lunar) or begun (solar)
Rest and reflect during eclipse energy
Pay attention to themes that emerge within 2 weeks of each eclipse
Note which houses the eclipses activate in your birth chart
Trust that changes happening are aligned with your highest path
emotionalThemes: Fatigue and need for extra rest

faqs.question: Can I manifest during an eclipse?
faqs.answer: Traditional wisdom advises against active manifestation during eclipses, as the energy is volatile. Observe what emerges and set intentions after the eclipse energy stabilizes.

faqs.question: How long do eclipse effects last?
faqs.answer: Eclipse effects can unfold over 6 months. Major shifts often happen within 2 weeks of the eclipse, but the full story reveals itself over several months.

faqs.question: Why do I feel tired during eclipses?
faqs.answer: Eclipses involve powerful cosmic energy shifts that can be physically and emotionally draining. Rest as needed and avoid over-scheduling during eclipse windows.

2026.ctaText: See how 2026 eclipses affect your birth chart
